import React, { useState, useRef } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Navbar() { const nav = useNavigate(); const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const buttonRef = useRef(null); const togglePopover = () => setIsOpen(!isOpen); function getCookie(name) { const value = `; ${document.cookie}`; const parts = value.split(`; ${name}=`); if (parts.length === 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift(); } const userInfo = getCookie("user"); return (
